subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On his 92nd and 93rd pitches, Mike Mussina gave up a double and a home run as July 4 at Yankee Stadium became just another numbing loss in a season full of them.
snippet: On his 92nd and 93rd pitches, Mike Mussina gave up a double and a home run as July 4 at Yankee Stadium became just another numbing loss in a season full of them.
